meanings.definition: Not delegated or assigned to another
meanings.sent1: The undelegated task remained with me.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to handle the undelegated responsibilities herself.
meanings.sent3: The cat's undelegated curiosity led it to explore the entire house.
meanings.sent4: His undelegated determination shone through in his solo performance.
meanings.sent5: The undelegated decision weighed heavily on his mind.

meanings.definition: Not given to someone else to do
meanings.sent1: The undelegated project required her full attention.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sense of pride in his undelegated work.
meanings.sent3: The undelegated sandwich mysteriously disappeared from the fridge.
meanings.sent4: Her undelegated effort in the competition paid off.
meanings.sent5: The undelegated responsibility fell squarely on his shoulders.

meanings.definition: Not transferred to another person or entity
meanings.sent1: The undelegated ownership of the house caused legal issues.
meanings.sent2: The undelegated authority rested solely with the manager.
meanings.sent3: The undelegated cookie jar tempted the children.
meanings.sent4: His undelegated loyalty to the company was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The undelegated decision-making power gave her control over the situation.
